title: Things you must do if you are true OCE
body:
- Chase into dark jungle
- Give shutdown gold in order to secure a kill
- Always remember that highest KDA wins, it's not about the Nexus
- You must never upgrade red trinket to level 2, that is ridiculous
- Control wards - don't know what they are, don't wanna know
- Understand power spikes - wuddat?

replies.body:
- Extremely toxic and it's always the junglers fault
- Can't speak english, only chinese
Because none of these things ever happen on other servers ;)

- Don't buy wards, don't use the warding totem you have and always blame the support for not warding, even though they have a sightstone, warding totem and 3 wards placed all the time.
- Initiate 1v3 as ADC, then blame support for not saving your sorry ass, even if they're on the other side of the map.
- Keep attacking that turret when your support pings to back off because the enemy jungler is about to gank your sorry ass. (Don't forget to blame your support for letting you die)
- Yes, go try and poke that Caitlin/Tristana as Garen ADC, you're totally going to win that trade...
playing support buy 2 control wards but then forget you bought them and never use them. (I'm not picking on other people, but I've done this a few times and I hate myself for it)
* kill yourself because you're playing league of legends on the oce server

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hIp7h2Ew,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-02-01T05:19:58.896+0000)
>
> * kill yourself because you're playing league of legends

Fixed.
Spam ping danger and fall back on teammate who is already running

> [{quoted}](name=OCE Yisus,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hIp7h2Ew,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-31T12:47:19.229+0000)
>
> Spam ping danger and fall back on teammate who is already running

They ain't as bad as the "?" ping spammers (you know the type, who don't actually use it to signal MIA but for "wat WAT11!!!1!11").
When people say that Dead Sea is salty, I show them this thread.
- Spam your teammates death timers in chat

* Spam pings for no reason
* Abuse your team the entire game
* Blame everyone else for your mistakes
* AFK once you hand over 1st blood from a 1v1
* Run into an already warded jungle where you can see 5 enemy team players sitting in a brush waiting to cheese you
* Never upgrade trinkets
* Run it down mid lane
* Blame your support for losing a 2v1 whilst they are running back to lane
* Continue to baron/drag when you have vision of the enemy jungler on the other side of the wall waiting to steal it and your smite is on CD
* Abuse people some more
* Blame others again
* AFK because your hungry
* Refuse to gank lanes because they filled your role
* last but not least, report people for flaming you after you abused them all game
